author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 16-year-old Plus One student was arrested on a charge of sexually abusing a six-year-old girl here on Friday.

When the girl informed her mother of the incident, her parents and the local people caught the boy and handed him over to All Women Police in Asaripallam.

The police registered a case under Sections 8 and 9 of the Protection of Children from Sexual Offences Act, 2012, and arrested the boy.

The girl has been admitted to Kanyakumari Government Medical College Hospital. The boy was produced before the Juvenile Court, which sent him to a juvenile home.

Driver killed

A man was killed and five others sustained injuries when a SETC bus bound for Thiruvananthapuram and a lorry transporting poultry waste collided head on at Karavilai on the Nagercoil-Thiruvananthapuram National Highway near Thuckalay on Friday.

According to police sources, bus driver Raja Singh (55), who was caught in the mangled front portion of the bus, died on the way to hospital and the five injured were rushed to Kanyakumari Government Medical College Hospital.
title: Student held for abusing 6-year-old
